subject: X Games
Olympic Games
Snowmobiles
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller, the American skier, showed this weekend in Austria that he has recovered from his injuries and is ready to take on the slopes at the Sochi Games.
snippet: Bode Miller, the American skier, showed this weekend in Austria that he has recovered from his injuries and is ready to take on the slopes at the Sochi Games.
